attributes.action: provide free day care and free transport to said day care for all elderly people who want it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, certainly in my local authority, in costs elderly people over ten pounds a day to come to the council-run day care centres.  For some elderly people, coming to a day care  centre is virtually the only time that they leave the house or see another person.
